api_name: Sendcloud API: Create a parcel

header.description: If you are an official Sendcloud Tech Partner, you can provide this additional request header for the system to recognize you. Sendcloud Partner UUID is provided to Sendcloud partners. The token is not required but if the header is set, the system will try to validate it. An unknown UUID will cause the 404 return, whilst an invalid one will return 400.
